T02D3185:199a-1: siddhee ae ka b'i ra s'a dha nam /
T02D3185:199a-3: dpa' bo gcig tu grub pa'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3185:199a-4: sngar bshad pa'i cho gas stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i rjes la /
T02D3185:199a-5: padma dkar po'i steng du yi ge a'a: dkar po
T02D3185:199a-6: las byung ba'i zla ba la yi ge dh'i: dkar
T02D3185:199a-7: po yongs su gyur pa las rje btsun 'jam dpal
T02D3185:199a-8: dpa' bo gcig tu grub pa zhes bya ba /
T02D3185:199a-9: sku mdog thams cad dkar ba zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
T02D3185:199a-11: g-yon pas autpala sngon po bsnams pa /
T02D3185:199a-12: lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang ldan zhing mdzes pa /
T02D3185:199a-13: rnam par bkra pa'i na bza' bsnams nas skyil krung
T02D3185:199a-14: gis bzhugs par bdag nyid skad cig gis rdzogs par
T02D3185:199a-15: byas la / mgo bo dang mgrin pa dang /
T02D3185:199a-16: snying ga rnams su yi ge aom a'a: h'um rnams dgod par bya'o //
T02D3185:199a-17: a'a:'i yi ge dang h'um gi gnyis kyi bar du
T02D3185:199a-18: yang yi ge dh'i:'i 'od zer gyis 'jig rten gyi
T02D3185:199a-19: don byed par gyur pas gsang sngags bzlas par bya
T02D3185:199a-20: ste / aom rdo rje rnon pos sdug bsngal gcod //
T02D3185:199a-21: shes rab ye shes dag gi sku //
T02D3185:199a-22: ye shes sku ste gsung dbang phyug / aa ra pa tsa na dbang 'dud //
T02D3185:199a-23: dpa' bo gcig tu grub pa'i sgrub thabs so //
